thread.section_title: Hotel Eugene en Ville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice, intimate hotel, well situated
thread.title_full: Nice, intimate hotel, well situated - Review of Hotel Eugene en Ville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Z8302KRcarolined
title: Nice, intimate hotel, well situated
text:
Cute little hotel well situated to the train stations and shopping areas; newly renovated, with a neat old Parisian features.
Quiet rooms are available and facing the courtyard.
If you need to hire a cab, better find one on your own...If the hotel calls for you, a lovely car and driver show up but you are charged an extra 4 euros surcharge.
